## In-class Exercise 5

Loading of libraries
```{r}
pacman::p_load(sfdep, sf, tmap, tidyverse)
```

Importing of data
```{r}
hunan <- st_read(dsn = "../../data/Hunan", 
                 layer = "Hunan")
```
```{r}
hunan2012 <- read_csv("../../data/Hunan/Hunan_2012.csv")
```

**For Take-home_Ex02, must make sure the 2 data sets have the same names to join on (check the name value closely also e.g. Anxiang in hunan's Name3)
```{r}
hunan <- left_join(hunan,hunan2012)%>%
  select(1:4, 7, 15)
```

```{r}
basemap <- tm_shape(hunan) +
  tm_polygons() +
  tm_text("NAME_3", size=0.5)

gdppc <- qtm(hunan, "GDPPC")
tmap_arrange(basemap, gdppc, asp=1, ncol=2)

```
